description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Pictorial Description of the United States: embracing the history, geographical position, etc. of each state and territory in the Union ... New edition ... enlarged" Author: SEARS, Robert. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10412.e.1." Page: 405 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1852 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003323088 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
